file(COPY  exclude tags ic_in_subckt.cir.hspice ic_in_subckt.cir ic_in_subckt.cir.sh ic_global_node_warning.cir.hspice ic_global_node_warning.cir ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ic_global_node_warning.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_global_node_warning.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;hspice;ic;nodeset")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_in_subckt.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ic_in_subckt.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ic_in_subckt.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_in_subckt.cir.prn )
